review: worked great right out of the box. Setup was easy and fast
author: MikeJ "oldno7"

review: Was easy to install.and works just like advertised.I was watching a movie right away.
author: rene segura

review: Works great. But not really that much free tv shows and movies
author: Tim lepley

review: Very simple to install, but is not useable. Constantly freezes and goes blank. Must hit the enter button 3 times to unfreeze. This happens about every every 2-3 minutes and sometimes more often. I am trying a few workarounds, so far nothing has worked, will probably return it.Update: I am changing the rating to 4 stars after finding out that the supplied HDMI adaptor was defective. After removing the adaptor and directly plugging the Firestick into the  HDMI port, everything works as it should.
author: John Annan

review: The fire stick allows me to watch my favorite shows and movies on my big screen instead of having to watch on my small Mac screen. Love it!
author: Noelle

review: I love my Fire TV Stick! Easy to set up. Easy to use. The price is right.
author: Abby Chase

review: Much easier set up than the Chromecast stick.
author: mjn

review: Very simple setup and to use.  Excellent Wi-Fi reception and simple to utilize.
author: Michael H

review: Easy to setup and to use.  Still trying to discover all the content.
author: Ceasar A

review: A bit time consuming to set up other then that works great so far
author: janet
